sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Image,
  Pressable,
  ScrollView,
  Spacer,
  Text,
  View,
} from "native-base";
import Colors from "../../color";

function Showing() {
  return (
    <Box h="full" bg={Colors.gray}>
      <ScrollView showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
        <View mt={2} bg={Colors.white} flexDirection="row" alignItems="center">
          <View w="30%" borderRightWidth={0.5} borderRightColor="gray.400">
            <Image
              source={{
                uri: "https://thoitrangbigsize.vn/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/1-6.jpg",
              }}
              alt="img"
              h={20}
              resizeMode="contain"
            />
          </View>

          <View ml={2} w="40%">
            <Text isTruncated>Áo khoác xịn đẹp lắm haha</Text>
            <Text bold color={Colors.red}>
              100,000đ
            </Text>
            <Text color="gray.500" fontSize={11}>
              23/12/2022 15:09
            </Text>
          </View>
        </View>

        <View mt={2} bg={Colors.white} flexDirection="row" alignItems="center">
          <View w="30%" borderRightWidth={0.5} borderRightColor="gray.400">
            <Image
              source={{
                uri: "https://thoitrangbigsize.vn/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/1-6.jpg",
              }}
              alt="img"
              h={20}
              resizeMode="contain"
            />
          </View>
          <View ml={2} w="40%">
            <Text isTruncated>Áo khoác xịn đẹp lắm haha</Text>
            <Text bold color={Colors.red}>
              100,000đ
            </Text>
            <Text color="gray.500" fontSize={11}>
              23/12/2022 15:09
            </Text>
          </View>
        </View>
        <View flexDirection="row" flex={1} justifyContent="space-between">
          <Pressable>
            <Text>a</Text>
          </Pressable>
          <Pressable>
            <Text>b</Text>
          </Pressable>
        </View>
      </ScrollView>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default Showing;
